content: the is easy level project worked in the round you will need 2 balls of premier home cotton yarn or similar yarn an h 5 00 mm crochet hook a yarn needle a stitch marker and a pair of scissors to make this pattern some brands of cotton yarn come in bigger balls than premier home cotton and only 1 ball will be enough yarn you will need about 2 5 oz of yarn this is easy pattern the project is worked in joined rounds it works up quickly these potholders are great to add to housewarming gift baskets
